name: Ashlander Tent
description: Brings a portable Ashlander tent to the world of Morrowind

name: Redesigned Vivec
description: This mod changes all the Cantons from the naff looking Pyramids to open plan mini-towns.

name: Mountainous Red Mountain
description: This mod makes Red Mountain higher, so it's no longer a little hill in distant land, almost to the max of game engine limits. It is roughly 1.6 times higher then before.

name: Vurts Grazelands
description: Yet another tree replacer for the Grazelands, this time inspired by african trees..
